main.name: Kaushik Vaghani
main.jobDescription: A passionate Full Stack Software Developer ðŸš€ having an experience of designing and building WEB applications and other cool libraries and frameworks.
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer with Passionate learner for new Technologies, Love to Learn and write about latest web technologies Development and Design in IT world like: Reactjs, Core MongoDB, ExpressJS, Java, NodeJS, JavaScript, SQL etc.  Currently looking to launch my career in the IT industry. I would like to meet new people with shared interest and hope to expand my network in IT world...
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: I was Completed 2 Live project in this course and lot's of learn here.

education.school: Shree Swaminarayan College of Computer Science
education.description: Ranked first with 60% in the program. Took courses about Application development, Web Tech., Operating Systems,...

work.title: Jr. Fullstack Developer
work.description: Working with New Technology and Learning New Thing. - First, 4 months trainee advanced logic build in javascript, HTML5, CSS3, ReactJS, A-Frame, and basic VR/AR, etc. - some third-party API integration completed and advanced researching about new tools and new tech implementation in company products. - working in Frontend website and Automation Tools Creating Tasks etc.

work.title: Jr. front & back-end web developer
work.description: Working with New Technology and Lerninng New Thing - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap Studio, GitHub, etc. - Wordpress Framework - Lead and manage team - Guide & train team members for enhancing their skills and supervise their work - Video Creating [2D Animation, WhiteBoard, Slides] - Social Media Handle & Paid Promotion [ Google Ads / Facebook / Instagram / Twitter ] - Graphics & Design ( Useing software like : Adobe XD, Corel Draw, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe illustrator, etc.. ) - Search Engine Optimization [SEO] - Business Branding.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Meteor JS
skills.description: I enjoy MeteorJS for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I used MeteorJS in a team for a Startup Programming class in UVIC in conjunction with React to build the MVP for Smirkspace (below in portfolio)

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Kaushik on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Kaushik excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
